abstract.text: Prepare your app to discover and control a Matter device.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: If you want your app to interact with a Matter device, you need to commission it.
Commissioning
a Matter device makes it a part of your
fabric
, which is a collection of Matter devices that communicate with each other.
You can securely commission a Matter device using certificates. Generate your own certificates using
or another process. Alternatively, you can provide a root
, and the Matter framework generates certificates for you.
The
framework provides an onboarding payload that you use to discover a device. Implement
to obtain the onboarding payload, then securely commission a Matter device using
. For more information, see

content.text: Set up security for the commissioning

inlineContent.text: Create an Identity Protection Key (IPK) and save it to iCloud Keychain. You need this IPK every time you start the controller for this fabric.

code: // Save the IPK in the keychain.

inlineContent.text: Next, create
. If you’re providing your own operational, intermediate, and root certificates, implement
and provide it to the controller so you can issue certificates to devices you commission.

code: func issueOperationalCertificate(forRequest csrInfo: MTROperationalCSRInfo, attestationInfo: MTRDeviceAttestationInfo, controller: MTRDeviceController) async throws -> MTROperationalCertificateChain {
let params = MTRDeviceControllerStartupParams(ipk: ipk, operationalKeypair: myKeypair, operationalCertificate: operationalCertificate, intermediateCertificate: nil, rootCertificate: rootCertificate)

inlineContent.text: Otherwise, pass in the IPK, a fabric identifier of your choosing, and the root
you created earlier. In this case, the Matter framework creates the certificates.
Store the root key and IPK in iCloud Keychain. Make sure you use the same fabric identifier every time you create this controller.
In either case, set
to your Connectivity Standards Alliance-assigned vendor identifier.

abstract.text: Coordinate and control compatible smart home accessories.
Allow people to add Matter accessories to your platform.

doc://com.apple.documentation/documentat.title: Adding Matter support to your ecosystem

abstract.text: Commissions the device with the onboarding payload.
Communicate with and control smart home devices from a variety of manufacturers.
